body.name: Evenflo Pivot Vizor Travel System with LiteMax Infant Car Seat (Promenade Blue)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins
features: PROVIDE QUIET MOMENTS FOR BABY: A unique, built-in mesh privacy shade adapts to all modes – on the infant car seat or stroller, in both toddler or carriage mode. The only travel system of its kind that can do all that

EASY PEASY ZIP & GO: The top part of the mesh privacy shade unzips and easily attaches to the toddler seat, while the bottom portion attaches to either the toddler seat or the infant car seat – no tools necessary. Stores in a convenient bumper bar pouch
MAKE CHANGES ON THE FLY: 6 modes offer the ultimate in versatility, including toddler seat mode that easily transitions to carriage mode
SWITCH IT UP: Reversible, modular frame allows you to face your child in or let your child look out in carriage mode, car seat mode or toddler mode
BRING A PLUS ONE: Accepts the Evenflo Rider Board (sold separately), making it easy for an extra passenger to step on board for the ride
MOVE SEAMLESSLY FROM CAR TO STROLLER: Includes an Evenflo LiteMax Infant Car Seat, providing industry-leading safety and comfort for babies weighing from 4 to 35 lb, as well as a stay-in-car base
body.description: When your little one needs a quiet moment, Evenflo® Pivot Vizor™ Travel System has it covered – literally. This is the only travel system with a mesh privacy shade to accompany your infant's car seat and stroller in both toddler and carriage modes. The privacy shade stores in a handy bumper bar pouch so it's ready at a second's notice, then zips to either canopy in no time – no tools necessary! How does it work? When it's time to break out the two-piece cover, simply unzip the top portion and attach to the toddler seat. Or you can pull the bottom portion from the pouch's zippered pocket and attach it to either the toddler seat or infant seat. Our Pivot Vizor Travel System is wildly popular for a versatile design that grows with your child. The reversible, modular frame allows baby to face in or out – in carriage mode, car seat mode or toddler mode. Not just clever, convenient. In all, there are 6 modes of use to choose from. Why so many? Because, as every parent knows, it's a relief to have options! The Pivot Vizor Travel System brings together a modular stroller designed for a child up to 55 lb with the Evenflo LiteMax™ Infant Car Seat for infants weighing from 4 to 35 lb. With large cruiser tires, front-wheel swivel and rear-wheel suspension, baby will appreciate a smoother ride and superior maneuverability. With a flip-flop friendly brake to keep the stroller still as you take your child in and out, an oversized peek-a-boo window for keeping tabs on baby, an oversized storage basket, and a flex-hold cup holder for the driver that locks to keep beverages secure, you'll have plenty to be happy about, too. For even more riding options, you can also add the accessory Stroller Rider Board (sold separately). Use it for an extra passenger or simply to give your child a way to quickly hop on and off when little legs need a break.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Clean minor spills and stains on cloth, vinyl or plastic surfaces with cold water and mild soap. Air dry. On models with removable seat pads, machine wash them separately in cold water–delicate cycle. NO chlorine bleach. Tumble dry 10 – 15 minutes on low heat, remove immediately. DO NOT iron or dry clean. Metal and plastic parts can be wiped clean with a soft damp cloth and dried with a soft cloth. DO NOT use abrasive cleaners.

productInformation.name: Assembly Instructions
productInformation.value: Adult Assembly Required, No Tools Needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So easy to push, Very light weight and easy to put together. So easy to interchange car seat. My daughter loves this stroller combo. We get compliments all the time on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so unsure and only saw it in the box before purchasing. Decided to order it due to price and features. I absolutely love this set more than my previous Chico and Eddie Bauer sets with my other kids. Comfy, light weight, and easy as heck to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stroller!! Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I researched a lot of strollers and read reviews for the car seat which was the most important part for me. This has good reviwes so I purchased for my first baby. I've been using this stroller for 3months and I love how easy it is to unfold and go. The base was relatively easy to install, and the seat clicks in and out very well. It feels sturdy and safe. The stroller maneuvers smoothly and quietly. I love it, I think it will last a long time and I'm happy to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little expensive. But love the travel system really good and comfortable for the baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used this thing in every way
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is awesome. We used it with the car seat till he outgrew it (we have a big boy). At 1 year 24lbs the only reason I’m switching is because with need a more airplane/stair friendly stroller. That being said we did use this for a flight which was great. It did not go in the overhead bin, we gate checked it. We kept having to carry it up 3 flights of stairs when the elevator went down. It’s not great for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not only is it a beautiful color, but it pushes like a dream. I don’t have to life up the seats to get to the diaper bag. Tons of room underneath!!! Super lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the look and its super easy to use way better then any other ones I've tried n my kids and 22 years to 3 years apart (5 kids) so I have tried plenty for years..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The multiple functuons of this stroller/car seat convo is what sets it apart from the others. With a newborn, you need the bassinet function. Trust me. It’sa game changer. This also has a wonderful wide and spacious under carriage basket area. And the wheels are large enough for smooth riding.
